name: S.T.A.R.
description:
When a star implodes in a supernova... Only a tainted star remains. And these stars are attacking the home of Pollux, the brightest star in the constellation Gemini! With a shotgun, and the power to create constellations, it's time to Shoot Tainted Astral Raiders. (S.T.A.R.)

In this FPS game, you have to purify as many tainted stars as posible. And the only way to do that is shooting them! Reach as far as possible!

  • Don't stop purifying
  • Stay alive as much as possible
  • Do cool constellations to get resources
  • Use your recoil as a way to jump higher!
Constellations✨

You need more ammo? Health? A big explosion? The stars are with you! Do different constellations holding Right Click!! Stars appear over time and when you purify a raider.

Ammo Health Star Meteor Controls ActionsButtonsMoveAWSD KeysLookMouseJumpSpaceShootLeft ClickConstellation PointingRight Click Credits
